snippet: Investigators say the pipeline operator, Enbridge, committed serious missteps before and during a 2010 oil spill in Michigan and that enforcement by a safety agency was lax.
abstract: Investigators say the pipeline operator, Enbridge, committed serious missteps before and during a 2010 oil spill in Michigan and that enforcement by a safety agency was lax.

headline.main: Preventable Errors Led to Pipeline Spill, Inquiry Finds

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration
